channel.title: Posts on Ahmad Alkadri
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ahmad Alkadri

item.title: Matrix Solving with Julia (and Numpy as comparison)
item.description: In which I got curious, rekindled my past with Julia (the language), and did some benchmark tests against NumPy.

item.title: Is It Possible to Really Know Someone?
item.description: This shouldnâ€™t have surprised me as much as it does, but I have come to the realization that, in conclusion, we will never fully know or understand others or even ourselves.

item.title: So Long, and Thanks For All The Tweets (Scraper)
item.description: As of yesterday, and confirmed by Elon Musk himself (kinda), Twitter requires people to be signed in to see tweets, even public ones. End of an era.

item.title: Getting New Hobby and Fixing My Twitter Scrapers
item.description: Or how I finally decided to stop procrastinating and just simply fix my own old Python module to scrape tweets and generating wordcloud from it.

item.title: Making TL;DR app With GPT
item.description: Work's been quite pressing for the past couple of week; for relaxation, I sprint-coded a webapp (using Streamlit) to summarize articles on the web this weekend.

item.title: Code and Kanji: Small Notes from Learning Rust and Japanese
item.description: A little blog from my recent efforts learning Rust and Japanese language

item.title: Finally Redeployed
item.description: Dusting off. Seriously, it's been a while since I used Hugo. Glad I still can manage to make it work.

item.title: Saying Goodbye to Heroku
item.description: On the end of Heroku's free tier and what it means for me.
